description: This source file defines core game logic for a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including modules for move validation, win detection, draw detection, and applying moves immutably. It handles game rules such as move legality, win condition checking across predefined lines, and ensuring no mutation occurs in the game state.

methods.name: cloneBoard(board)
methods.description: Internal utility to create a defensive copy of the game board array.

methods.name: isValidMove(board, index, gameOver)
methods.description: Checks if a move is valid: cell within range, empty, and game not over.

methods.name: getWinner(board)
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner by checking all winning line combinations.

methods.name: isDraw(board)
methods.description: Checks if the game is a draw, i.e., no winner and all cells filled.

methods.name: applyMove(board, index, player, gameOver = false)
methods.description: Returns a new board with the move applied if valid, otherwise returns the original board.
